channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A volcano erased an island’s plants. Their DNA revealed how life starts over
item.description: Volcanic eruptions on the remote island of Nishinoshima repeatedly wipe the land clean, giving scientists a rare chance to study life’s earliest stage...

item.title: Hubble just revealed the fiery heart of the Cigar Galaxy

item.title: Stress measured in hair could predict depression and anxiety in children

item.title: Scientists just found the “master switch” for plant growth
item.description: Scientists at Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory have cracked open the secrets of plant stem cells, mapping key genetic regulators in maize and Arabidopsis...
